layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x72
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x72
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x56
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 232x56 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 230x54
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 230x24
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (2,15) size 168x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=2 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 164x19
                text run at (2,2) width 164: "This cell spans two rows"
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (172,2) size 56x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 52x19
                text run at (2,2) width 52: "xxx xxx"
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,28) size 230x24
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (172,28) size 56x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 52x19
                text run at (2,2) width 52: "xxx xxx"
